Pressione o botão POWER(Ligar) para iniciar o sistema...

muxlaunch.Content marked as favourite can be found: Conteúdos marcados como favoritos, podem ser encontrados e iniciados aqui
muxlaunch.Content on storage devices (SD1/SD2/USB): Aqui você pode acessar e rodar conteúdos dos dispositivos de armazenamento (SD1/SD2/USB)
muxlaunch.Content previously launched can be found: Conteúdo aberto anteriormente pode ser encontrado e aberto aqui

muxlaunch.Various configurations can be changed he: Várias configurações podem ser alteradas aqui
muxlaunch.Various information can be found and lau: Várias informações podem ser encontradas e iniciadas aqui

Password must be 8.63 characters!: A senha deve ter de 8 a 63 caracteres!

muxnetscan.Detect, display and connect to available: Detecte, exiba e conecte-se a redes Wi-Fi disponíveis

muxnetwork.Cannot modify while connected!: Não é possível modificar enquanto conectado!

muxnetwork.Enter the device IP address here (Static: Enter the device IP address here (Static only)

muxnetwork.Toggle the Wi-Fi network on and off: Toggle the Wi-Fi network on and off

muxoption.Set the CPU governor for the selected co: Set the CPU governor for the selected content or directory
muxoption.Set the system core or external emulator: Set the system core or external emulator for the selected content or directory

muxpower.Configure how the power button functions: Configure how the power button functions on long press (2 seconds)
muxpower.Configure the time the device will sleep: Configure the time the device will sleep when no input is detected
muxpower.Configure the time the screen will dim w: Configure the time the screen will dim when no input is detected
muxpower.Configure when the red LED will display: Configure when the red LED will display based on the current capacity percentage
muxpower.Idle Input Display Timeout: Tempo de Inatividade para Desligar a Tela
muxpower.Idle Input Sleep Timeout: Tempo de Inatividade para a Suspensão

muxstorage.Change where muOS looks for Network Prof: Change where muOS looks for Network Profiles

muxstorage.Change where muOS looks for RetroArch Co: Change where muOS looks for RetroArch Configurations
muxstorage.Change where muOS looks for background m: Change where muOS looks for background music
muxstorage.Change where muOS looks for content imag: Change where muOS looks for content images and text
muxstorage.Change where muOS looks for favourites,: Change where muOS looks for favourites, history, and assigned content
muxstorage.Change where muOS looks for save states: Change where muOS looks for save states and files
muxstorage.Change where muOS looks for themes: Change where muOS looks for themes
muxstorage.Leave on AUTO to look on SD2 first and f: Leave on AUTO to look on SD2 first and fall back to SD1.

muxtheme.This theme has no attributed credits!: This theme has no attributed credits!

muxtweakadv.Adjust the rate of speed when holding na: Adjust the rate of speed when holding navigation keys down
muxtweakadv.Change how the device buttons work globa: Change how the device buttons work globally
muxtweakadv.Change how the font type works in the fr: Change how the font type works in the frontend - 'Theme' will ensure frontend will use fonts within themes with a fallback to language fonts - 'Language' will specifically use language based font
muxtweakadv.Change the default audio level that the: Change the default audio level that the device will use each time it starts up
muxtweakadv.Change the default brightness level that: Change the default brightness level that the device will use each time it starts up
muxtweakadv.Change the default theme used for the ne: Change the default theme used for the next device launch
muxtweakadv.Change the displayed battery percentage: Change the displayed battery percentage to improve accuracy based on calibration or known deviations in the battery capacity reading
muxtweakadv.Change the storage device where muOS loo: Change the storage device where muOS looks for user content - Changing these settings can cause critical failures, only change if you know what you are doing!
muxtweakadv.Switch between device speaker or externa: Switch between device speaker or external monitor audio via HDMI connection
muxtweakadv.Switch between system sleep suspend stat: Switch between system sleep suspend states
muxtweakadv.Toggle a delayed start of RetroArch unti: Toggle a delayed start of RetroArch until a network connection is established
muxtweakadv.Toggle between ADB and MTP USB functiona: Toggle between ADB and MTP USB functionality
muxtweakadv.Toggle startup and shutdown verbose mess: Toggle startup and shutdown verbose messages used for debugging faults
muxtweakadv.Toggle the passcode lock - More informat: Toggle the passcode lock - More information can be found on the muOS website
muxtweakadv.Toggle the power LED during content laun: Toggle the power LED during content launch
muxtweakadv.Toggle the system ability to automatical: Toggle the system ability to automatically shut the device down due high temperature
muxtweakadv.Toggle vibration for device startup, sle: Toggle vibration for device startup, sleep, and shutdown

muxtweakgen.Change the brightness of the device to a: Change the brightness of the device to a specific level
muxtweakgen.Change the colour temperature of the dis: Change the colour temperature of the display if the device supports it
muxtweakgen.Change where the device will start up in: Change where the device will start up into
muxtweakgen.Settings that should only be changed by: Settings that should only be changed by those who know what they are doing!
muxtweakgen.Settings to change the power features of: Settings to change the power features of the device
muxtweakgen.Settings to change the visual aspects of: Settings to change the visual aspects of the frontend
muxtweakgen.Toggle hidden content displayed in Explo: Toggle hidden content displayed in Explore Content - Place a '.' or '_' character at the start of a file or folder name to hide it
muxtweakgen.Toggle the HDMI output to a specific res: Toggle the HDMI output to a specific resolution and frequency
muxtweakgen.Toggle the background music of the front: Toggle the background music of the frontend - This will stop if content is launched
muxtweakgen.Toggle the navigation sound of the front: Toggle the navigation sound of the frontend if the current theme supports it

muxvisual.Change the display priority of the conte: Change the display priority of the content images
muxvisual.Change the screen alignment of the conte: Change the screen alignment of the content images
muxvisual.Changes the top title label in Explore C: Changes the top title label in Explore Content to show current storage device along with folder name
muxvisual.Rearranges the label of content to move: Rearranges the label of content to move the 'The' label to the front - For example, 'Batman and Robin, The' to 'The Batman and Robin'
muxvisual.Remove extra information from content la: Remove extra information from content labels - This does NOT rename your files it only changes how it is displayed
muxvisual.Replaces the dash (-) with a colon (:) f: Replaces the dash (-) with a colon (:) for content labels
muxvisual.Replaces the label of shortened content: Replaces the label of shortened content folders to more appropriately named labels
muxvisual.Toggle the background animation of the c: Toggle the background animation of the current selected theme
muxvisual.Toggle the visibility of currently selec: Toggle the visibility of currently selected file along with total in Explore Content
Toggle the visibility of currently selected folder along with total in Explore Content
muxvisual.Toggle the visibility of the battery gly: Toggle the visibility of the battery glyph
muxvisual.Toggle the visibility of the bluetooth g: Toggle the visibility of the bluetooth glyph
muxvisual.Toggle the visibility of the clock: Toggle the visibility of the clock
muxvisual.Toggle the visibility of the item count: Toggle the visibility of the item count within folders in Explore Content
muxvisual.Toggle the visibility of the network gly: Toggle the visibility of the network glyph

muxwebserv.Toggle Resilio - WebUI can be found on p: Toggle Resilio - WebUI can be found on port 6060
muxwebserv.Toggle SFTP support - WebUI can be found: Toggle SFTP support - WebUI can be found on port 9090
muxwebserv.Toggle SSH support - Access via port 22: Toggle SSH support - Access via port 22
muxwebserv.Toggle Syncthing - WebUI can be found on: Toggle Syncthing - WebUI can be found on port 7070
muxwebserv.Toggle network time protocol for active: Toggle network time protocol for active network connections
muxwebserv.Toggle virtual terminal - WebUI can be f: Toggle virtual terminal - WebUI can be found on port 8080
